title: Webinar: How Modern SOC Teams Use AI and Context to Investigate Cloud Breaches Faster
description: Cloud attacks move fast â€” faster than most incident response teams. In data centers, investigations had time. Teams could collect disk images, review logs, and build timelines over days. In the cloud, infrastructure is short-lived. A compromised instance can disappear in minutes. Identities rotate. Logs expire. Evidence can vanish before analysis even begins. Cloud forensics is fundamentally
